params._highBugBountyUsers: Array of addresses for high criticality bug bounties

registerLowBugBountyUsers(address[]).details: Register low criticality bug bounty users

params._lowBugBountyUsers: Array of addresses for low criticality bug bounties

registerMediumBugBountyUsers(address[]).details: Register medium criticality bug bounty users

params._mediumBugBountyUsers: Array of addresses for medium criticality bug bounties

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

calculateRemainingContractDeploymentRewa.notice: Returns the amount of tokens still available for contract deployment rewards
